metadata.title: tcgpulls.xyz - Track Your Trading Card Game Pulls & Collection
metadata.description: Track your Trading Card Game pulls, manage your collection, and analyze your pull rates. Log your booster pack openings and build your TCG collection history.
metadata.keywords: pokemon cards, pull rates, tcg collection, pack opening tracker, pokemon tcg, booster packs, card collecting

footer.copyright: This website is not produced, endorsed, supported, or affiliated with Nintendo or The Pokémon Company.

auth.not-authenticated: You need to be signed in to view this page.

errors.access-denied-action: You do not have permission to perform this action.

tcg.notes-placeholder: Enter a note. (e.g. small dent on top-right corner, gift from friend, etc.)

collection.add-form-description: Please enter the details below. (Defaults will be used if left blank.)
collection.remove-confirm-description: Are you sure you want to remove this item from your collection?
collection.add-error: Card could not be added to collection.
collection.remove-error: Card could not be removed from collection.

landing-page.title: Your TCG Journey Starts Here
landing-page.subtitle: The ultimate companion for Trading Card Game collectors. Manage your collection today, with pack opening analytics coming soon.

manage-collection.title: Manage Collection
manage-collection.description: Keep your entire collection organized. Track conditions, variants, and maintain a complete database of your cards.

track-pulls.title: Track Your Pulls (Coming Soon)
track-pulls.description: Soon you'll be able to log every pack opening and keep a detailed history of your pulls. Never lose track of what you've opened.

analyze-stats.title: Analytics Dashboard (Coming Soon)
analyze-stats.description: Track costs and potential profits from your pack openings. Get insights into your pull rates and collection value.

coming-soon.title: More Features Planned
coming-soon.description: Market trends integration, collection sharing, and more exciting features in development. Stay tuned!

metadata.title: tcgpulls.xyz - Track & Analyze Your Trading Card Game Collection
